title: The Music album: songs of the south
brief_description: This film is a compilation of songs originating from the southern states of America featuring “Showboat melodies” performed by The Marshalls including ‘I come from Alabama’, ‘Way down upon the Swanee River’ and ‘Campdown races’ and The Dixiairs performing ‘Waiting for the Robert E. Lee’ and ‘Dear old Southland’.
